pageContext.claim: “Hey, take your cameras and spin them around this big arena. Go ahead. Spin them a little.They don't tell you, they don't tell you. you know they say don't turn them, but if there was some kind of trouble in a little corner, anything to make us look bad, that camera would turn like a pretzel.”
pageContext.analysis: News channels regularly show the crowds at Trump's rallies, even though he claims they do not.
